title: Prestige Skins Now Give Icons!

embed.description: You should feel confident using Prestige Points and event tokens on the skin you want most-so here's the lineup of Prestige skins that'll come out in the first half of 2020. No spoilers on unrevealed thematics!

replies.body:
>At that time, 2019's Prestige Point skins will become unobtainable outside of Hextech Crafting drops.

Asking because not 100% sure I follow. 
So this means I can get the 2019 prestige skins from Hextech/Masterworks boxes right?

The skins yes, but the borders will no longer come with them. The same will apply to the borders and icons for 2020 released prestige skins unless you craft them during the time that they are normally available.

I believe they were given the same rarity as mythic skins (so a tiny chance).
